name: Slack
description: Interact with 4me directly from your Slack channels.
features: Create requests in 4me from Slack using the command /4me or using a Slack message's action menu.
compliance: By installing this app, you grant 4me access to interact in your Slack workspace channels. By using the 4me Slack app, you agree to the [4me API Terms of Service](https://www.4me.com/api-terms-of-service).
